text: Ia fomɨra dughiar ruarimɨn navir ghurimɨn arazibar gɨn zui. Ia, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim puvatɨzibar arazir kurabar amuasa ifongezɨ moghɨn ia fomɨra arazir kabagh ami. Arazir kaba, dara kara: me afiar arazibagh amuava; arazir mɨzɨrɨzibar amuasa bar kufi; egha dɨpar onganiba apava onganigha; isar dafabagh amua dagher avɨriba apava, egha pura gumazamiziba isa pura pamtemɨn diava ighiar kurabar arazibagh ami; egha nguazir kamɨn biziba e God gami moghɨn uari isa dagh anɨdi, egha bizir kam gamua aghumsɨziba puvatɨ.
